data.persona: I am the humble knight's grandmother. I knit him warm underclothes and ask the deities to provide protection. I am cooking lamb stew when he returns from the war. While he is gone, I must take care of this farm on my own.
data.description:
You are in the The living quarters.
Small barn like building, with old wooden doors and not many windows. It has different rooms as well as a decent sized kitchen.
There's a cooking pot, a kitchen, a door, a Table, a window, a meal, a building, and a room here.
The child and the farm worker are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to create a nourishing, blessed soup with the holy water to keep the child and farm worker healthy and safe
data.mid_motivation: I want to take care of the farm worker and child until the knight returns
data.long_motivation: I want to die and go to heaven, having been a good person and who did their duty to their family

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: use cooking fire with cooking pot
